para.text: If changes are made to a unit, they need to be saved properly. The changes can be saved over the existing unit file or saved as another unit file.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-13px; margin-top:10px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:35px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none; font-family:Verdana; font-size:9pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Select the unit to save from the model explorer.

li.text: Saving a unit as another file does not delete the original unit file. Please delete it manually if no longer required.
